Description: Our start-up division is looking for a Development Manager to join our team. The Manager of Development will be responsible for driving growth and development of our business in the air ticket industry.Responsibilities:- Develop and execute strategies to increase sales and revenue- Identify new market opportunities and potential customers- Build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including airlines, travel agencies, and customers- Monitor industry trends and competitor activities to stay ahead of the curve- Manage a team of sales representatives and provide guidance and support as needed- Develop and implement marketing campaigns to promote our products and services- Analyze data and metrics to measure success and identify areas for improvementSkills
Skills: - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or related field
- Minimum of 3 years of experience in tourism or business development, preferably in the air ticket industry
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team
- Proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving business growth
- Knowledge of airline ticket sales and industry trends
If you meet the requirements for this position and are interested in joining our team, please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration.
